wseemann.media
Interface FFmpegMediaPlayer.OnErrorListener

Enclosing class:
FFmpegMediaPlayer
public static interface FFmpegMediaPlayer.OnErrorListener

Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when there has been an error during an asynchronous operation (other errors will throw exceptions at method call time).

Method Summary
 boolean onError(FFmpegMediaPlayer mp, int what, int extra)
          Called to indicate an error.
 

Method Detail

onError

boolean onError(FFmpegMediaPlayer mp,
                int what,
                int extra)
Called to indicate an error.

Parameters:
mp - the MediaPlayer the error pertains to
what - the type of error that has occurred:
  • FFmpegMediaPlayer.MEDIA_ERROR_UNKNOWN
  • FFmpegMediaPlayer.MEDIA_ERROR_SERVER_DIED
extra - an extra code, specific to the error. Typically implementation dependant.
Returns:
True if the method handled the error, false if it didn't. Returning false, or not having an OnErrorListener at all, will cause the OnCompletionListener to be called.
